TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LayoutEditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart
Public NotInheritable Class LayoutEditorPart Inherits EditorPart

summary.span: 提供一个编辑器控件，最终用户可以使用该控件编辑关联 控件的几个面向布局的用户界面 (UI) 属性。

span.span: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类是派生自类的编辑器控件, 用于编辑影响关联或控件的布局的属性。 The class is an editor control that derives from the class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated or control. 正如 Web 部件控件集中有面向工具的区域 (有关详细信息, 请参阅类概述), 提供面向工具的部件控件 (工具部件), 并且每个工具部分必须位于特定类型的工具区域中。Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone. Web 部件控件集中的工具部件具有两个区分特征:Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - 它们是帮助用户控件, 使最终用户能够个性化 Web 部件页面上的控件。They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page. - 它们仅在某些显示模式中可见。They are visible only in certain display modes. 控件是一种仅在 Web 部件页面处于编辑模式时, 以及在选择特定控件进行编辑的情况下变为可见的工具部件。 The control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific control has been selected for editing. 与所有其他 控件一样,控件位于控件中。The control, like all other controls, resides in an control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 区域只能包含控件, 而不能将控件置于任何其他类型的区域中。 An zone can contain only controls, and controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone. 类具有一个属性, 该属性可获取或设置布局控件的标题。 The class has a property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control. 类还具有一个属性, 该属性重写基属性并返回。 `true`The class also has a property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`. 这意味着 , 当页面处于编辑模式时, 控件始终可见, 即使正在编辑的控件上的属性设置为`false`也是如此。This means that the control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the property on the control being edited is set to `false`. 换句话说, 用户始终可以编辑控件中的属性, 即使其他控件无法编辑指定控件也是如此。In other words, users can always edit the properties in a control, even if a specified control cannot be edited by the other controls. 类还具有两个重要的方法: 和, 它们从类继承并重写。 The class also has two important methods, and , which it inherits from the class and overrides. 方法非常重要, 因为它们允许获取和设置编辑器控件的字段值和正在编辑的控件的属性之间的属性值。The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the control being edited. 在大多数情况下, 控件应在页持久性格式中使用`` , 方法是``在``元素内声明一个元素, 该元素又包含在网页中的元素内。In most cases, the control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `` element inside a `` element, which is in turn contained by an `` element on a Web page. 控件使最终用户能够编辑控件的以下 UI 属性: The control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a control: - - - 若要编辑控件的其他属性和行为, 可以使用随 Web 部件控件集提供的其他控件。To edit other properties and behavior of controls, you can use the other controls supplied with the Web Parts control set. 这些控件包括 、和控件。These controls include the , the , and the control. 提供的控件应提供编辑控件所需的大多数编辑功能, 但也可以通过从类继承来创建自定义编辑器控件。The supplied controls should provide most editing features required to edit controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the class. 有关代码示例, 请参阅类概述。For a code example, see the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 为了提高可访问性 , 控件在`
`元素中呈现。To improve accessibility, the control is rendered within a `
` element. 元素对用于在控件中进行编辑的相关控件集进行分组, 并为视觉对象用户代理 (如普通 Web 浏览器) 和面向语音的用户代理等控件中的选项卡式导航提供便利。 `
`如屏幕阅读软件)。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下, 为此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准, 例如 Web 内容可访问性准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级1指导原则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页上声明控件, 并使其能够编辑控件的多个 UI 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to declare a control on a Web page, and enable it to edit several UI properties of a control. 此代码示例包含三个部分:The code example has three parts: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含控件和控件的网页, 用于编辑控件的布局属性。 A Web page that contains an control and a control, which is used to edit the layout properties of a control. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载页面时工作。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中源代码的说明, 请参阅[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#5)] 此代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含对控件的声明性引用, 其中包含一个``子元素, 其中包含对控件的声明性引用。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to a control. 请注意, 此页还包含绑定到 Pubs 数据库的控件; 因为此控件驻留在某个区域中 , 所以它将作为可由控件编辑的控件。Note that the page also contains a control that is bound to the Pubs database; because this control resides in a zone, it functions as a control that can be edited by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击 "**创作列表" Web 部件**控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 (向下箭头), 然后单击 "**编辑**" 开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑 UI 可见后, 可以看到控件, 并在其上方显示一个按钮和文本框。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 如果在编辑 UI 中进行一些更改, 并单击 "**应用**" 按钮, 则可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件将页面返回到浏览模式, 并查看编辑更改的完整效果。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 创建该类的一个新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认构造函数; 类中没有声明任何构造函数, 因此在创建类的新实例时, 不会执行任何特殊任务。 The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. 通常不需要使用构造函数, 因为你可以在设计时以声明方式向页面添加控件。Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a control to a page declaratively at design time. 但是, 如果出于某种原因需要以编程方式添加控件, 则可以使用构造函数。However, if you need to add a control programmatically for some reason, you can use the constructor.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool ApplyChanges ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean
public: override bool ApplyChanges();
override this.ApplyChanges : unit -> bool

summary.span: 将 控件的值保存到关联 控件的相应属性。

span.span: Saves the values from a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果将值从 控件保存到 控件的操作成功，则为 ；否则（如果出现错误）为 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法。 The method is a critical method on a control. 此方法的目的是将用户在控件上设置的值保存到关联控件中的相应属性。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a control to the corresponding properties in the associated control. 关联的控件在控件的继承属性中引用。The associated control is referenced in the control's inherited property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能从自己的代码中调用方法。You cannot call the method from your own code. 但是, 如果您需要对编辑控件所提供的不同控件属性的过程进行更多的编程控制, 则可以创建自定义控件并提供您自己的此方法的实现。However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various control properties than the control provides, you can create a custom control and provide your own implementation of this method. 有关示例, 请参见方法。For an example, see the method. 此方法尝试设置关联控件上的以下属性:The method attempts to set the following properties on the associated control: - - - 当用户在编辑用户界面 (UI) 中单击表示 "确定" 或 "应用" 谓词的按钮时, 将调用方法。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).

exception.span: 当在关联 控件上设置 属性的值时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred when setting the value of the property on the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 重写从 控件继承的基属性以在设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它受主题影响。

span.span: Overrides the base property inherited from the control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含接收 控件中的默认焦点的 控件的 ID。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the control that receives the default focus in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此属性是公共的，但它用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码调用。Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Display { get; }
.property instance bool Display
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };
member this.Display : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当某个控件的关联 控件在编辑模式下时是否应显示该控件。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否应显示该控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使 属性位于`true` 关联`false`控件上, 属性也将返回。 The property returns `true` even if the property is `false` on the associated control. 这是为了使控件在编辑模式下始终可用, 即使在控件无法由其他控件编辑时也是如此。This is so that the control can always be available in edit mode, even when a control cannot be edited by the other controls.

summary.span: 从 控件检索属性值并将这些属性值分配给关联 控件。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control and assigns them to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是控件上的关键方法。 The method is a critical method on a control. 它实现基类中的方法, 检索关联控件中的当前值, 并使用这些值更新控件中的子控件, 以便用户可以对其进行编辑。It implements the method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated control, and updates the child controls in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 只要关联控件中的值发生更改, 就会调用方法。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 对于控件,包含控件的区域将在调用方法之后立即调用方法, 以使控件中的值始终与关联的控件。For a control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 调用方法的另一种情况是在控件最初进入编辑模式时。Another case where the method is called is when a control is initially entering edit mode.

para.span: 虽然你可以从代码中调用方法, 但并不需要这样做。

span.span: Although you can call the method from your code, it is not necessary to do so.

para.span: Web 部件控件集在编辑过程中的适当时刻调用此方法和方法, 以使编辑控件与其关联的控件保持同步。

span.span: The Web Parts control set calls this method and the method at the proper times in the editing process to keep editing controls synchronized with their associated controls.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Title { get; set; }
.property instance string Title
Public Overrides Property Title As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件在编辑模式中可见时, 属性值显示在控件的标题栏中。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in edit mode. 在页面中声明控件时, 可以为`Title`属性设置一个值。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值, 则使用特定于区域性的默认值来描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 此代码示例演示如何使用 控件的属性。This code example demonstrates how to use the property of a control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码演示如何在网页中以声明方式设置控件的标题。The following code shows how to set the title on a control declaratively in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的下一部分演示如何以编程方式设置属性的值。The next part of the code example shows how to set the value of the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/CS/layouteditorpartcs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_LayoutEditorPart_Overview/VB/layouteditorpartvb.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 可以在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑模式**" 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击 "**创作列表" Web 部件**控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 (向下箭头), 然后单击 "**编辑**" 开始编辑。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the **Author List WebPart** control, and click **Edit** to begin editing. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时, 可以看到控件, 并在其上方显示一个按钮和文本框。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the control, and a button and text box positioned above it. 请注意, 控件的标题是在网页的声明性标记中分配给它的值。Note that the title of the control is the value assigned to it in the declarative markup of the Web page. 如果在 "**更新 EditorPart 标题**" 按钮旁边的文本框中输入一些文本, 然后单击按钮, 则会更新控件的标题。If you enter some text in the text box next to the **Update EditorPart Title** button, and then click the button, the title for the control is updated.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
